languages.text: {n}Напряженно наблюдающая за происходящим сестра Арджента бледнеет и творит знак аквилы, отгоняющий зло.{/n}
{n}Sister Argenta, who has been watching all of this intently, grows pale and makes the sign of the Aquila to ward off evil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Напряженно наблюдающая за происходящим сестра Арджента бледнеет и творит знак аквилы, отгоняющий зло.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La Hermana Argenta, que observa la situación atentamente, palidece y hace el signo del Aquila para protegerse del mal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta, who has been watching all of this intently, grows pale and makes the sign of the Aquila to ward off evil.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La Hermana Argenta, que observa la situación atentamente, palidece y hace el signo del Aquila para protegerse del mal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}目の前の状況をジッと見ていたシスター・アルジェンタは青白くなり、邪悪を払うためにアクィラの印を結んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta, who has been watching all of this intently, grows pale and makes the sign of the Aquila to ward off evil.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}目の前の状況をジッと見ていたシスター・アルジェンタは青白くなり、邪悪を払うためにアクィラの印を結んだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔修女一直在密切地关注着这一切。此刻，她脸色发白，做了个双头鹰手势，希望以此驱散邪恶。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta, who has been watching all of this intently, grows pale and makes the sign of the Aquila to ward off evil.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔修女一直在密切地关注着这一切。此刻，她脸色发白，做了个双头鹰手势，希望以此驱散邪恶。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sœur Argenta, qui a observé la scène avec attention, pâlit et fait le signe de l'Aquila pour éloigner le mal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta, who has been watching all of this intently, grows pale and makes the sign of the Aquila to ward off evil.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sœur Argenta, qui a observé la scène avec attention, pâlit et fait le signe de l'Aquila pour éloigner le mal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Schwester Argenta, die all das genau beobachtet hat, erblasst und führt das Zeichen des Adlers aus, um das Böse zu vertreiben.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Schwester Argenta, die all das genau beobachtet hat, erblasst und führt das Zeichen des Adlers aus, um das Böse zu vertreiben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Olanları dikkatle izleyen Rahibe Argenta kül kesiliyor. Kötülüğü kovmak için Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapıyor.{/n}
